net.canarymod.api

Interface OfflinePlayer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    PlayerReference

    public interface OfflinePlayer
extends PlayerReference
    An offline player. This is an offline version of a registered player. OfflinePlayer contains information about groups, permissions, world and location where the player has logged out, according to data on disk.
    Author:
    Chris (damagefilter), Jason (darkdiplomat)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CompoundTag getNBT()
      Get the NBT tag for this offline player
      void save()
      Save changes made to this offline player.

      • save

        void save()
        Save changes made to this offline player. Important: This will only apply if the player is not online!
